original_text: The people had lost nothing. David brought everyone back, the young people and the old people, the sons and the daughters. He brought back all the valuable things and everything that the Amalekites had taken.
korean_text: 그들이 약탈하였던 것 곧 무리의 자녀들이나 빼앗겼던 것은 크고 작은 것을 막론하고 아무것도 잃은 것이 없이 모두 다윗이 도로 찾아왔고

sentences.original_text: the young people and the old people
He brought back all the valuable things
and everything that the Amalekites had taken.
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 아말렉 사람들이 가져간 모든 것을.
